about.summary: Note, that the 'PMCMR' package is superseded by the novel 'PMCMRplus' package. The 'PMCMRplus' package contains all functions from  'PMCMR' and many more parametric and non-parametric multiple comparison procedures, one-factorial trend tests, as well as improved method functions,  such as print, summary and plot.  The 'PMCMR' package is no longer maintained, but kept for compatibility of reverse depending packages for some time.

Note, that the 'PMCMR' package is superseded by the novel 'PMCMRplus' package. The 'PMCMRplus' package contains all functions from  'PMCMR' and many more parametric and non-parametric multiple comparison procedures, one-factorial trend tests, as well as improved method functions,  such as print, summary and plot.  The 'PMCMR' package is no longer maintained, but kept for compatibility of reverse depending packages for some time.

name: r-pmcmr
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "4.4" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-pmcmr
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: PMCMR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/PMCMR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/PMCMR/PMCMR_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: e7b4d9d595a879a62c9b3bb44c1f95432ad75a6607f84ce6bfc6395fee1dc116

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 4
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('PMCMR')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('PMCMR')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=PMCMR
  license: GPL (>= 3)
  summary: "Note, that the 'PMCMR' package is superseded by the novel 'PMCMRplus' package. The 'PMCMRplus' package contains all functions from  'PMCMR' and many more parametric and non-parametric multiple comparison procedures, one-factorial trend tests, as well as improved method functions,  such as print, summary and plot.\
    \  The 'PMCMR' package is no longer maintained, but kept for compatibility of reverse depending packages for some time. "
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
